title: @Meddler Can we get some context on Darius nerfs?
body:
{{champion:11}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:254}} 
Got alot of context on buffs/nerfs/changes so can we talk about why is {{champion:122}}  being changed so suddenly and what are the future plans?

replies.body: Darius has been on our watchlist for a while having been pretty dominant top lane since the pre-season. We initially wondered if it was just Courage of the Colossus being overtuned and whether we should avoid making any changes to him until that had been nerfed. Grasp of the Undying builds seem to be performing just as well on him however, so we concluded we did need to take some power out of Darius himself.

any changes planned for {{champion:126}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:120}} or the other champions that have been *much* more oppressive and have seen more success than Darius lately? 

What about Riven's ability to be immune to cc? That bug has been around for awhile but you guys disable Teemo for being able to disappear to fast? 

Don't get me wrong, I'm glad you guys got some changes in that were necessary. Poppy's nerfs and Lucian's buffs were definitely needed, it just seems like you guys have priorities in the wrong places for some things.

Vi - We've got some nerfs prepared for Vi, we want to see how the jungle and CotC changes affect her before shipping them though since she'll be one of the most affected.

Hecarim - Similar to Vi, though we haven't prepared a changelist yet (more confident state of the jungle and CotC is what's making him out of line). 

Jayce - Jungle/CotC changes shouldn't impact him meaningfully (possibly slightly buff him if anything given some other top laners will end up a bit weaker). Will be assessed again at the start of the 7.3 planning process.
Wait you're *buffing* jayce?
Nerfing CotC and jungle XP is probably a small indirect buff to Jayce and other champs who lane against CotC users.

Also, more camille nerfs? She still has by far the highest win rate of top lane and her kit is still incredibly overpowered.

I believe that yea darius is way strong to fight 1v1 during the early game because of the bonus AD being high but if you go through the current changes for Darius, you should also pull back the Decimate nerf during 5.20 patch (Decimate - Blade width reduced to 220 from 270.), don't you think? Heck even Quinn, the bitch of the sky I've seen struggle against somewhat competent Darius's.
